cot.content:
To solve the problem, Please think and reason step by step, then answer.
question:
when is winter big brother going to start
        
Generation Format:
Reasoning process:
Answer:

Reasoning process: 
To determine when "Winter Big Brother" is going to start, we first need to clarify what "Winter Big Brother" refers to. It could be a specific season of a reality TV show, typically known as "Big Brother," which may have a winter edition. Reality shows often have specific airing schedules, and if there is a winter edition, it would likely air during the winter months. 

Next, we need to consider the typical airing schedule for reality shows like Big Brother. In many countries, Big Brother has summer editions, and if there is a winter edition, it might start in late fall or early winter. 

To find the exact start date, we would typically look for announcements from the show's producers or network, which are often made a few weeks to a month before the show begins. 

Since I don't have access to real-time data or announcements beyond October 2023, I would recommend checking the official website or social media channels of the show for the most accurate and up-to-date information.

Answer: I do not have the specific start date for "Winter Big Brother," but it typically airs in late fall or early winter. Please check the official show announcements for the exact date.

when is winter big brother going to start

Several sites speculated that the winter edition could have been an American version of "Celebrity Big Brother" but this was untrue as CBS released a statement that the next edition of "Big Brother" would be a regular season following the format of past editions. The season was announced on November 15, 2007 with open casting calls being held from November 17, 2007 to December 8, 2007. The finalists for the season were chosen on December 27, 2007.\n', 'Big Brother Slovenija 2016 is the fourth main season of the Slovenian version of "Big Brother", which is broadcast on Kanal A. This season launched on Friday 26 February 2016. The host of the show this season is Manja Plešnar. The prize will be €50,000. This season Big Brother house is located in Vevče, Ljubljana, Slovenia.\n', 'This season started on 11 October 2015. This is the first Swedish Big Brother season to include new rules of "Power player" like in the British version. This will also be the shortest season with 70 days inside the house.br\n', 'On June 12, 2019, It was revealed the seventh season will start in autumn 2019. Just three days before the finale, a housemate for the Big Brother 7, Karolina Włodarska, entered the house as a guest.\n', 'BULLET::::- "Big Brother"—Renewed for a nineteenth and twentieth season on August 10, 2016.\n', '"Big Brother" will release in the final quarter of 2019, release date is yet to be announced.\n', 'On June 10, 2012 "Nova TV" confirmed that "VIP Brother 4" would commence in September and that an "all-stars" edition of "Big Brother" would be aired after the finale at the end of 2012.\n', 'BULLET::::- "Big Brother"—Renewed for a seventeenth and eighteenth season on September 24, 2014.\n']

Big Brother 2014 is the ninth season of the Finnish reality television series "Big Brother" that premiered on August 24, 2014, on Sub.
Big Brother 2012 is the eight season of the Finnish reality television series "Big Brother" that premiered on August 28, 2012, on Sub.
Following the 2007-2008 Writers Guild of America strike, the trade magazine "Variety" reported that CBS, in response, was considering airing a winter edition of "Big Brother", and that the network started cast auditions. Several sites speculated that the winter edition could have been an American version of "Celebrity Big Brother" but this was untrue as CBS released a statement that the next edition of "Big Brother" would be a regular season following the format of past editions. The season was announced on November 15, 2007 with open casting calls being held from November 17, 2007 to December 8, 2007. The finalists for the season were chosen on December 27, 2007.
Big Brother Slovenija 2016 is the fourth main season of the Slovenian version of "Big Brother", which is broadcast on Kanal A. This season launched on Friday 26 February 2016. The host of the show this season is Manja Plešnar. The prize will be €50,000. This season Big Brother house is located in Vevče, Ljubljana, Slovenia.
This season started on 11 October 2015. This is the first Swedish Big Brother season to include new rules of "Power player" like in the British version. This will also be the shortest season with 70 days inside the house.br
On June 12, 2019, It was revealed the seventh season will start in autumn 2019. Just three days before the finale, a housemate for the Big Brother 7, Karolina Włodarska, entered the house as a guest.

BULLET::::- "Big Brother"—Renewed for a seventeenth and eighteenth season on September 24, 2014.
